name: A Night to Remember (hydroz0ne)
description:
The night finally sets and you're finally home. Everything seemed peaceful but little do you know, things won't be the same. You are a police officer and you meet an escaped prisoner, what will you do? Features of the game:

  • There are 7 endings.
  • This game was made by Twine, so it can be launched in the browser.

This is my first game made by Twine and for Level 4 Creative Computing - Digital Storytelling.
